parameters.name: AddrPoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the address pool.

parameters.name: EvaluationCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of consecutive exceptions detected. If the number of consecutive exceptions detected reaches the maximum number, the application service is deemed abnormal.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The health check interval. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language of the values of specific response parameters. Default value: en. Valid values: en, zh, and ja.

parameters.name: MonitorExtendInfo
parameters.description:
The extended information, that is, the parameters required for the protocol. Different protocols require different parameters:

*   HTTP or HTTPS:

    *   port: the port to check.

    *   host: the host configuration.

    *   path: the health check URL.

    *   code: the status code threshold. If the returned status code is greater than the specified threshold, the application service is deemed abnormal.

    *   failureRate: the failure rate.

    *   sni: specifies whether to enable Server Name Indication (SNI). This parameter is only required for the HTTPS protocol. Valid values:

        *   true: enables SNI.
        *   false: disables SNI.

    *   nodeType: the type of the monitored node when the address pool type is DOMAIN. Valid values:

        *   IPV4
        *   IPV6

*   PING:

    *   failureRate: the failure rate.

    *   packetNum: the number of ping packets.

    *   packetLossRate: the loss rate of ping packets.

    *   nodeType: the type of the monitored node when the address pool type is DOMAIN. Valid values:

        *   IPV4
        *   IPV6

*   TCP:

    *   port: the port to check.

    *   failureRate: the failure rate.

    *   nodeType: the type of the monitored node when the address pool type is DOMAIN. Valid values:

        *   IPV4
        *   IPV6

parameters.name: ProtocolType
parameters.description:
The protocol used for the health check. Valid values:

*   HTTP
*   HTTPS
*   PING
*   TCP

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: The health check timeout period. Unit: milliseconds.
